metadata.description: Battle-tested Claude Code configurations from an Anthropic hackathon winner

plugins.name: backend-log
plugins.description: Query backend service logs from Google Cloud Platform. Supports K8s (GKE), Cloud Run, and Cloud Functions.

plugins.name: backend-patterns
plugins.description: Backend architecture patterns, API design, database optimization for Node.js, Express, and Next.js.

plugins.name: beads-task-tracker
plugins.description: Distributed git-backed task tracking for AI agents with hash-based IDs.

plugins.name: clickhouse-io
plugins.description: ClickHouse database patterns, query optimization, and analytics best practices.

plugins.name: coding-standards
plugins.description: Universal coding standards and best practices for TypeScript, JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

plugins.name: continuous-learning
plugins.description: Automatically extract reusable patterns from Claude Code sessions as learned skills.

plugins.name: continuous-learning-v2
plugins.description: Instinct-based learning system with confidence scoring that evolves into skills/commands/agents.

plugins.name: deep-research
plugins.description: Autonomous multi-step research agent that produces structured reports.

plugins.name: eval-harness
plugins.description: Formal evaluation framework implementing eval-driven development (EDD) principles.

plugins.name: frontend-patterns
plugins.description: Frontend patterns for React, Next.js, state management, and performance optimization.

plugins.name: golang-patterns
plugins.description: Idiomatic Go patterns and best practices for robust, efficient applications.

plugins.name: golang-testing
plugins.description: Go testing patterns including table-driven tests, subtests, benchmarks, and fuzzing.

plugins.name: iterative-retrieval
plugins.description: Pattern for progressively refining context retrieval to solve the subagent context problem.

plugins.name: maestro-test-fixer
plugins.description: Fix failing Maestro UI test scripts with systematic debugging workflow.

plugins.name: multi-agent-swarm
plugins.description: Coordinate multiple AI agents with consensus protocols and hierarchical task routing.

plugins.name: planning-with-files
plugins.description: Manus-style persistent markdown planning pattern using filesystem as memory.

plugins.name: postgres-patterns
plugins.description: PostgreSQL patterns for query optimization, schema design, indexing, and security.

plugins.name: quant-research
plugins.description: Quantitative finance research including backtesting, data analysis, and trading systems.

plugins.name: repo-everything
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin and learning system - complete collection of agents, skills, hooks, commands.

plugins.name: repo-gen2
plugins.description: Qashier Backend Services - Monorepo for backend services powering web, mobile, POS.

plugins.name: repo-gen2-core-table-management
plugins.description: Qashier Table Management Service - handles restaurant tables, seating, reservations.

plugins.name: repo-gen2-core-transaction
plugins.description: Qashier Transaction Service - handles POS transactions, orders, payment flows.

plugins.name: security-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive security checklist for authentication, user input, secrets, and APIs.

plugins.name: skill-learner
plugins.description: Create or update skills in everything-claude-code repo, make installable as plugins.

plugins.name: speckit
plugins.description: Spec-Driven Development workflow from constitution to specification to implementation.

plugins.name: strategic-compact
plugins.description: Manual context compaction at logical intervals to preserve context through task phases.

plugins.name: tdd-workflow
plugins.description: Test-driven development with 80%+ coverage including unit, integration, and E2E tests.

plugins.name: test-fix-loop
plugins.description: Multi-agent test-fix cycle with parallel repair workers until all tests pass.

plugins.name: verification-loop
plugins.description: Comprehensive verification: build, type check, lint, test, and security scans before PR.

plugins.name: everything-claude-code
plugins.description: Complete collection of agents, skills, hooks, commands, and rules evolved over 10+ months.
